snippet: T-Mobile said in a lawsuit filed in Seattle that thefts by employees of the Chinese smartphone maker included part of a robotic arm used for testing handsets.
abstract: T-Mobile files lawsuit against Huawei Technologies, accusing Chinese smartphone maker of stealing technology from T-Mobile's headquarters.
lead_paragraph: T-Mobile said in a lawsuit filed in Seattle that thefts by employees of the Chinese smartphone maker included part of a robotic arm used for testing handsets.

headline.main: T-Mobile Accuses Huawei of Theft From Laboratory
headline.print_headline: T-Mobile Accuses Huawei of Theft From Laboratory
